creator: stephane.morucci@francetelecom.com
text:
Hello,

I downloaded JMeter and tried to recompile everything in my Java env. 
When I try to run the NonGuiDriver.java (with jmeter.properties and a correct 
testplan.jmx), I have the exception given below.
Any idea ?
Thank you in advance.

No current Handler for TestPlan
org.apache.jmeter.save.xml.NoCurrentHandlerException

(XMLDocumentScanner.java:1094)No current Handler for ConfigElement

(XMLDocumentScanner.java:381)
	at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLParser.parse(XMLParser.java:1098)

You need to 
a) convert your old JMeter 1.7 testplan into the 1.7.x file format (open it in
JMeter with the GUI).  Possibly you'll need to fix a few things.

or

b)Have a TestPlan element at the top your .jmx file (which I assume you did, but
I'm including here for completeness)
creator: mstover1@apache.org
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
